I'm super new to Flux so probably a very basic question but how do I get Flux to recognize the parameters of my custom layer? Based on docs I tried this but doesn't seem to work:
```struct LinearCombo{T}
    c :: T
end
(lc::LinearCombo)(x, y) = @. x + lc.c * y
Flux.@functor LinearCombo
params(LinearCombo(1)) # gives Params([])```
